version_description: We Won’t Stop making T-Mobile Tuesdays better.  With this update we’re making it easier for you to redeem your free gifts and have added more epic-ness to your weekly game playing. Remember to come back every Tuesday to #GetThanked.

We Won’t Stop making T-Mobile Tuesdays better.  With this update we’re making it easier for you to redeem your free gifts and have added more epic-ness to your weekly game playing. Remember to come back every Tuesday to #GetThanked.

We Won’t Stop making T-Mobile Tuesdays better.  With this update we’re making it easier for you to redeem your free gifts and have added more epic-ness to your weekly game playing. Remember to come back every Tuesday to #GetThanked.

The thankings just keep on coming with T-Mobile Tuesdays. We’ve updated our app to make sure you get the best #GetThanked experience possible. Make sure to stop by every Tuesday to see what free stuff and epic prizes you can score.

The thankings just keep on coming with T-Mobile Tuesdays.  We've updated our app to make sure you get the best #GetThanked experience possible.  Make sure to stop by every Tuesday to see what free stuff and epic prizes you can score.

The thanking train isn’t stopping anytime soon. We’re making some updates to our app to give you the best possible experience. Make sure you check out T-Mobile Tuesdays every week to see what kind of epic loot you’re gonna score!

We’re keeping the thankings coming—just making a few tweaks to give you the best possible experience. This update will fix a couple of bugs and enhance a few features. Check out the app on Tuesday and see how we’re thanking our customers big time.

T-Mobile Tuesdays is making some changes so you can keep getting thanked! We’ve fixed a few bugs and added new features like in-app messaging and the option to gloat on all prizes. Remember, check your app every Tuesday and see what you score!
Now, getting your thankings just got even easier. We improved your inbox messaging plus made some fixes under the hood to give you the best possible T-Mobile Tuesdays experience.
Now, getting your thankings just got even easier. We improved your inbox messaging plus made some fixes under the hood to give you the best possible T-Mobile Tuesdays experience.

What’s New
We decided to put on our best party outfit! We’ve updated a few T-Mobile Tuesdays screens so we can look great for the summer!
There’s a Tuesday every week—so, sometimes we need to make a few updates. We’re making sure we give you the best possible experience when getting thanked!
T-Mobile Tuesdays is new and improved with an updated look, feel and a whole lot of thankings. Just open your app every week and score something great from the partners you love!

Fancy seeing you here again. T-Mobile Tuesdays upgrades regularly to make sure every Tuesday is better than the last.

What's new? We added a sound toggle to our games so you can listen to music while you're winning big. And, we included a few bug
Now, getting your thankings just got even easier. We improved your inbox messaging plus made some fixes under the hood to give you the best possible T-Mobile Tuesdays experience.
Nothing fancy going on with this update. We’ve made some tweaks to optimize performance and fixed a few bugs to make sure your thankings keep coming!

Just doing some fine tuning to make sure your thankings keep coming. In this version we’ve made a few updates to games, visuals and social features. Plus of course some bug fixes to improve speed and stability.
We’ve made a few updates to T-Mobile Tuesdays. Just a couple of bug fixes and a fun addition or two. Check the app on Tuesday so you can #GetThanked.
We’ve made a few updates to T-Mobile Tuesdays. Just a couple of bug fixes and a fun addition or two. Check the app on Tuesday so you can #GetThanked.

We’re back with a few updates to bring you the best possible T-Mobile Tuesdays experience. We’ve simplified our navigation, fixed a few bugs and tweaked some sound controls. Plus, we’re bringing you a new way to enter our sweepstakes. Check it out!
What's new? We've updated our app so it takes up less room on your phone, made it easier for you to redeem offers, improved our games and fixed a few bugs! Check in every Tuesday for a thanking!

More new stuff! We've made a few updates including new animations, an added game and some fresh deal reveals. Plus, it's now even easier to share what you scored. Check in on Tuesday and see for yourself.

With this update, My Stuff only shows the deals you select. Just tap “Claim” to add your loot. Don’t forget to stop in every week and #GetThanked.

With this update, you’ll need to tap “Save” to add deals to My Stuff. Plus, we’ve sped up our app and added countdown timers—so you know how much time you have left to redeem each deal. Check in every week and #GetThanked.
We’ve made improvements to make your Tuesdays even better. Make sure your app is up to date and #GetThanked every week.
Our customers rule, and we want to give them an app that rules, too. We fixed some bugs and improved performance. Take a look, and don’t forget to check in every week to #GetThanked.
We’ve got a new look! You’ll see our fresh design right when you open your app. You can find and redeem your thankings the same way, so keep checking in every week and #GetThanked.

This release features:
• A fresh, new look and simpler design.
• New top navigation with links to skip to each section.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

The latest version features the ability to receive occasional local bonus offers. Turn on your location services within the app settings so you can #GetThanked with deals in your area.
